leads.lead_text: Racemes with long (4–8 mm), dense, silky hairs, usually rather weakly reflexed; very rare grass of north and north-west
Racemes glabrous or sparsely hairy, soon strongly deflexed; occasional in dry, rocky sites in east and north-east
